tasks.description: Search for recent best practices on a technical topic with source quality filtering
tasks.input: Find the most authoritative and recent resources on implementing OAuth 2.0 with PKCE flow in a single-page application. I need official documentation, security considerations, and practical implementation guides. Filter out outdated content (before 2023).

scoring.5: Uses advanced operators (site:, after:, exact phrases), decomposes into sub-queries for different aspects (docs, security, implementation)
scoring.3: Uses some operators but relies on a single broad query
scoring.1: Basic keyword search with no operators
scoring.0: Searches the raw user input as-is

scoring.5: All results directly address OAuth 2.0 PKCE in SPAs; includes official RFC/docs, security analysis, and code examples
scoring.3: Most results are relevant but some are tangential (e.g., general OAuth without PKCE, server-side flow)
scoring.1: Mix of relevant and irrelevant results; generic authentication articles
scoring.0: Results do not address the specific query

scoring.5: Results from 3+ credibility tiers (e.g., RFC/official docs, security blogs, developer guides); no content farms; sources clearly attributed
scoring.3: Results from 2 source types; mostly credible but some questionable sources included
scoring.1: Results from a single source type or includes low-quality sources

scoring.5: Each result has: title, source, date, credibility assessment, and relevance summary; results are ranked; synthesis provided
scoring.3: Results have titles and URLs but missing some metadata; basic ranking
scoring.1: Unstructured list of URLs or titles
